Html:
I would also love to be able to place constraints on the zoom/pan, limiting the range it can operate on in a graph/chart.

Would there be any chance of considering this for a future release?

Sure you're sick of me already :)

Cheers,

Nick

Hi again!

We've planned these constraints, but you'll have to wait a little bit for them - they'll be ready approximately in D3 v0.2.3 or even a bit later.
